PerfectNetExp.abs: 物种灭绝_百度百科 ... 黄岛长吻虫 Saccoglossus hwangtauensis Ⅰ Aurochs 原牛（aurochs） 1627年 Guadalupe Wren 瓜达卢佩异鹩 1892年.
欧洲野牛(Aurochs)生活在14万年前至17世纪，肩高近2米，体重可达1吨。欧洲野牛长有弯曲的牛角。
...对巨角)]，ariel(阿拉伯瞪羚)，area野水牛)，arnee(雌山羊)，ascalphidae(蝶角岭科)长有长棒状触角)],audad(蛮羊)，aurochs(古代欧洲野牛)。显而易见，A可以由“牛角”这一含义顺利过渡到“尖，针，刺，芒”等引申含义上，有以下词汇为证.

list.abs: and now this is the only Russian nature reserve for aurochs .现在这里是俄罗斯唯一的欧洲野牛自然保护区。
only the boldest hunters tackle the aurochs ., 惟有最勇敢的猎人能对付野牛.

黑冠羽鳃鰺(Ulua aurochs):又称丝背羽鳃鰺。 羽鳃鰺(Ulua mentalis):又称短丝羽鳃鰺。尾甲鰺属(Uraspis)[编辑]白舌尾甲鰺(Uraspis helvola)  棉口尾甲鰺.
黑冠羽鳃鲹(Ulua aurochs):又称丝背羽鳃鲹。 羽鳃鲹(Ulua mentalis):又称短丝羽鳃鲹。尾甲鲹属(Uraspis)[编辑]白舌尾甲鲹(Uraspis helvola)  棉口尾甲鲹.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from German, early variant of Auerochs, from Old High German ūrohso, from ūr (form also found in Old English , of unknown origin) + ohso 'ox'

means.word_mean: 1. European bison having a smaller and higher head than the North American bison
2. large recently extinct long-horned European wild ox; considered one of the ancestors of domestic cattle

auth_sentence.content: Heck, given the regrowth of the European forests, I vote for the aurochs, too.

auth_sentence.content: He showed me the scapula of an aurochs, an extinct forebear of domestic cattle, weighing more than two thousand pounds.
